data.text: @scotgov Yes what is the Scottish government doing we are going back ward not forward that's three deaths heard of this week in Glasgow EastEnd.. people are going about as if nothing floating in the air ignromas people
@chunkylover25 @ExExPat2010 @scotgov My preference - Better to live with restrictions instead of loosing love ones or dying or live with multiple medical complication.
@NMT_Laura @scotgov You could be talking about flu, if the government had been bombarding us with daily messages about how many people had died of it etc.
@AndyBrodic @scotgov You can’t recognise any of them? Don’t worry. Leave the thinking to others. Stop eating your plasticine!

@scotgov Too many people are of the opinion that the virus has gone. Acting like there is nothing happening. Yet so many are still losing their lives, losing loved ones, scared to go out, scared to go to school or work and scared of passing this on to vulnerable loved ones
@SeamusBaranov @scotgov There are different degrees of stupidity. But guess what..
